MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 postcode area of Amlwch, affecting properties in Pen Bonc Road, Wendon Drive and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:25 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required to locate the fault and as soon as we have a confirmed time for restoration of supply we will update this message again. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40 am on 12th April, 2021.
